passives.name: Fey Ancestry
passives.description: The chitine has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic canâ€™t put the chitine to sleep.

passives.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
passives.description: While in sunlight, the chitine has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

passives.name: Web Sense
passives.description: While in contact with a web, the chitine knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

passives.name: Web Walker
passives.description: The chitine ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The chitine makes three Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
